channel.title: Building a server with a group!
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]ok im gonna make a server with 1-3 people here are the thigns i can code[/glow]
[glow=red,2,300]my codeing level 6/10[/glow] i can add voids i can add commands i can add npc (talk aswell) change the way drag weps hit change the name of the server to servername-scape i can make island admin zones safe zones
[glow=red,2,300]what i use to host?[/glow] sadly i use hamachi but maybe we can get it on no-ip helpin me or maybe if u have no-ip we can host from your comp but if u got just hamachi ill host 24/7
[glow=red,2,300]about me[/glow] u can see from all my post im not 100% perfec im more like 45 and yes i have made like 3 server and posted them but they got boring
[glow=red,2,300]what i exspect[/glow] msn a person with 5/10 codeing skill good with talking in a 3 way convo
[glow=red,2,300]just post here if u wanna join[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]my msn is..k0mb02006hotmail.co.uk[/glow]
